favourite.article: O God of my strength! Lord ! the strength of my heart! I will wait on Jehovah.... Lord You know my heart....
Hallelujah. In Christ we will rise up again.This is enough.

A very strengthening song! As we are waiting for His coming, no matter what will happen and no matter how hard our circumstances we will face, He will always be the strength of our heart, giving us grace when the labor increases and He is sending more grace when the burden grows greater. Such a Christ we have! You are truly our everything! Lord, whatever may happen WE WILL RISE UP AGAIN IN YOU.
May we be those persons who love His appearing. Praise Thee our Lord for He is our very strength in times of weaknesses and failures because in Him we will rise up again.
In Christ, I will rise up again. Amen!

I enjoy how easy and simple it is to turn to the Lord. In our daily living, we tend to complicate things, but really, all He wants us to do is to open up to Him so He can enter into our hearts! We are weak, but we can take Christ as our strength to overcome the flesh. Our Lord Jesus Christ is the light that always shine in the darkness, praise the Lord for His faithfulness!!
Just what I needed to have with me today. Praise You Lord for Your faithfulness.
I want to download the notes for me to play it in the keyboard. The hymn refreshes me to wait for our Lord Jesus Christ.
This song reminds me that as a believer in Christ Jesus, I must wait for Him in times of challenges. He is able to lift me up when I fall.
